nipadawana sthanaya sakaskara ganima nishpadana sthanaye bhumiya pirisidu kara ganna.gal kata iwath kara polowa mattam kara ganna.pasa mathupita burul nam thappa molakin pasa thala ganna.sthanaye wathura basa yamata kanu paddhathiyak sakaskara ganna.nishpadana sthanaye kanu idikale nam ema idikala kanuwalin kapagath pas dama bima yamthak durata uswana se sakaskara ganna.bimata simenthi damima awashya nowanu atha.amudrawya sapaya ganima pradeshaye sulabha kola warga, thana kola, jalaja wal palati, boga awashesha yanadiya pradeshaye pahasuwen labagatha haki oonama saththwa apadrawya warga nipadawa gath kompost swalpayak (”muhun” lesa) yedima sandaha (amudrawya kilo gram 1000 kata muhun kilo gram 20 k pamana yedima pramanawath we.)haki nam eppawala rok pospet pohora sapaya ganna.(

diyawannawa pitara yamen yatawu parlimenthu sankirnaye miniththu atakatath adu kalayakata sima wu eeye (11) raswimedi aandu pakshaya, wipakshaye ekangathawayen panath hayak wiwadayakin thorawa sammatha kara gathha.athi wu hadisi thaththwaye di wadagath panath hayak wiwadayakin thorawa sammatha kirimata sahayogaya laba dun wipakshayata, aandu pakshaya sthuthiya pirinamana bawa sabhanayaka, warimarga ha jala kalamanakarana amathi nimal siripala da silwa mahatha parlimenthuwedi eeye (11) prakasha keleya.wethradhari anil parakrama samarasekara mahatha wisin senkolaya thanpath kirimen pasuwa kathanayaka chamal rajapaksha mahathage pradhanathwayen parlimenthuwa paswaru 1.00 ta eeye (11) raswiya.mudal panatha yatathe niyoga, wishesha welenda bhanda badu panatha yatathe niyamayan, nishpadana badu (wishesha widhiwidhana) panatha yatathe niyamaya, shri lanka apanayana sanwardhana panatha yatathe niyoga saha aarakshaka ansha wenuwen wen karana paripuraka asthamenthuwak athulu yojana hathak pilibandawa eeye (11) parlimenthu wiwadaya pawathwimata niyamitha wiya.eheth athiwu ayahapath kalagunika thaththwaya hethuwen ema yojana atharin hayak pilibandawa wiwadayakin thorawa sammatha kirimata wipakshaya ekanga wu bawath shri lanka apanayana sanwardhana panatha yatathe niyogaya pamanak wenath dinayakadi wiwada kirimata wipakshaya paksha nayaka raswimedi illa siti bawath amathyawaraya pawasiya.ee anuwa ema wiwadaya wenath dinayakadi pawathwimata aandu pakshaya thiranaya kara athi athara parlimenthuwa labana dasaya wanida perawaru 9.30 dakwa kalthabana bawath amathiwaraya prakasha kaleya.aarakshaka ansha samajikayin wenuwen wen karana biliyana pahalowaka paripuraka asthamenthuwak pilibandawa da eeye sakachcha kirimata niyamithawa thibu athara pawathi ayahapath kalagunika thaththwaya nosalaka parlimenthu raswimata sahabhagi wu paksha wipaksha siyalu manthriwarunta thaman sthuthiya pala karana bawath amathiwaraya pawasiya.ehidi nagi siti kurunagala disthrik (ejapa) parlimenthu manthri dayasiri jayasekara mahatha sandahan kale pasugiyada sammatha kara gath sudu wishesha widhiwidhana panathath samanga mema dharanipatha warshawa athi wu bawayi..
